**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 19 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 [Oaksteward Enforcer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2451) **Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 14 **Perception** +6 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Druidic](/Languages.aspx?ID=23) **Skills** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +5, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +6 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +0 **Int** -2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +0 **Items** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12) --- **AC** 16 **Fort** +4 **Ref** +6 **Will** +8 **HP** 15 --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** staff +6 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning **Melee** dagger +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+2 piercing **Ranged** dagger +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+2 piercing **Druid Prepared Spells** DC 16, attack +8 - **Cantrips (1st)** [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330) - **1st** [Magic Fang](/Spells.aspx?ID=179), [Shillelagh](/Spells.aspx?ID=282) **Wild Shape** ([Morph](/Traits.aspx?ID=113), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The Oaksteward's hands transform into wild claws for 1 minute. The Oaksteward gains the following Strike.
Melee claw +7 (agile, finesse), Damage 1d6+2 slashing
name: Oaksteward Enforcer
